type: Modernization and upgrading of electrical networks - Sorel Base
short_summary: Project involves modifying gatehouse building to separate electrical systems from other installations
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Fisheries and Oceans Canada is issuing this bid solicitation. The project involves modifying the existing gatehouse building in order to separate the electrical systems from the other installations and build a fully independent electrical room. It will include architectural, structural, mechanical and electrical work.
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
================ stavu

Tender Announcement
-----------------

**Solicitation Title**
-------------------

Title: Modernization and Upgrading of Electrical Networks at Sorel Base

**Reference Number**
-----------------

WS4241834024

**Tender Status**
----------------

The solicitation for the modernization and upgrading of electrical networks at Sorel Base has been closed. It was solicited as a request for proposal under the competitive open bidding method.

**Project Overview**
-------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Fisheries and Oceans Canada, is seeking proposals for the modernization and upgrading of electrical networks at Sorel Base. The project aims to upgrade the existing electrical systems and separate them from other installations to ensure a fully independent electrical room.

**Key Project Details**
---------------------

*   **Location:** Sorel-Tracy
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not Specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-10-12
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement

**Selection Criteria**
-------------------

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------

The tender closed on 2023-11-21T14:00:00.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For any queries or additional information, please contact:

*   Jennifer Kirouac (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: [jennifer.kirouac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jennifer.kirouac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

You can also refer to the [official solicitation](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17638670?extsite=MTc2Mzg2NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for further details.
